directions: In the container of a food processor or blender, combine the jalapeno pepper and red chile pepper. Pulse until finely chopped. Transfer to a serving dish, and mix in the raspberry preserves, raspberry syrup and apple cider vinegar. Taste, and adjust amounts to suit your palate.
ingredients: 1/2 red chile pepper, seeded and chopped
title: Spicy Raspberry Jelly Dip
